metadata.methodology: FTE estimates combine: (1) LinkedIn/job-board role volume signals, (2) revenue-proportional benchmarks, (3) public disclosures on team sizes. Estimates are order-of-magnitude; actual headcounts are not publicly disclosed at this granularity.

professional_services.estimation_note: Based on PS revenue of ~$2.2B, Salesforce PS is known to be low-margin. Typical PS FTE costs at $130-180K loaded yield ~4,500-5,500 FTEs. Cross-check: ~6.5% of 72K total employees = ~4,700.

Implementation Project Managers.source_note: ~560 open PM/Sr PM roles on LinkedIn (Feb 2025). Implied total ~700-750 given typical 12-15% open-role ratio.

Configuration / Technical Analysts.source_note: Largest PS cohort. ~1,200 Technical Analyst/Config roles visible on LinkedIn globally. Significant India presence (Hyderabad CoE).

Solution Architects.source_note: ~350 Solution Architect / Technical Architect roles on LinkedIn. Predominantly US/UK-based, client-facing.

Engagement / Delivery Managers.source_note: ~250 Engagement Manager / Delivery Lead roles visible. Almost entirely onshore and client-facing.

Training & Enablement Specialists.source_note: Trailhead content team + field enablement. ~280 related roles on job boards. Growing digital content team in India.

QA / Test Engineers.source_note: ~500 QA/test roles across PS and product. Significant India/Philippines presence for regression testing.

Practice Leads / Directors.source_note: Senior leadership layer. Not heavily posted externally. Estimated from org-design benchmarks (~5% of PS function).

customer_success.estimation_note: Salesforce CS organization restructured 2023-2024. Estimated ~3.8% of total headcount. CSM ratios at Salesforce are reported to be ~1:25 for enterprise, 1:80+ for commercial.

Customer Success Managers.source_note: ~800 CSM/Sr CSM roles on LinkedIn (high turnover role). 58% of CSMs industry-wide prepared to leave per ChurnZero 2025 report.

Renewal Managers.source_note: ~310 Renewal Manager roles visible. Salesforce renewals are notoriously complex given multi-product contracts.

Onboarding Specialists.source_note: ~290 Onboarding Specialist / Implementation Success roles. Growing role as Salesforce pushes 'quick start' packages.

Customer Health / Analytics Analysts.source_note: ~180 health/analytics roles. Salesforce uses Gainsight internally. Strong data team in India.

Scale / Digital CS Reps.source_note: Growing digital-touch motion for SMB/commercial segment. ~280 Digital CS / Scale Advisor roles visible.

CS Operations / Strategy Analysts.source_note: ~160 CS Ops / Strategy Analyst roles. Centralized CS operations team supporting global org.

customer_support.estimation_note: Salesforce offers Standard, Premier (20-30% of license fee), and Signature support tiers. ~7% of total headcount. Agentforce now handles 84% of help.salesforce.com queries (1M+ conversations since Oct 2024).

Tier-1 Support Representatives.source_note: ~1,600 Support Rep / Technical Support roles visible. Heavy India/Philippines presence. Agentforce projected to deflect $50M/yr in Tier-1 costs.

Tier-2 Technical Support Engineers.source_note: ~950 Technical Support Engineer / Support Engineer roles on LinkedIn. Mix of US, India, and Dublin teams.

Support Operations / Workforce Mgmt.source_note: ~260 Support Ops / WFM roles. Includes queue management, SLA reporting, and scheduling functions.

Knowledge Base Authors / Content Mgrs.source_note: ~210 KB / Technical Writer roles. Feeds into Trailhead, Help articles, and now Agentforce training data.

Escalation / Critical-Issue Managers.source_note: Estimated from benchmark ratios. Not heavily visible on job boards as typically filled internally.

Support QA / CSAT Analysts.source_note: ~180 QA / CSAT Analyst roles. Growing as Salesforce invests in support quality metrics.

Premium / Designated Support Engineers.source_note: Signature Success is a major revenue stream. ~450 Designated Support Engineer / TAM roles visible. Primarily onshore, client-facing.
